Thought I'd give everyone a heads up on this. At 10am and again at 
4pm, on June 8th, the History Channel will be having a program called 
Samurai. This is in the Eastern Time Zone. It appears that the show 
will run about 2 hours both showings. 

Also, the Independent Film Channel will be having the movie Samurai 
Rebellion on Saturday, June 22 at about 6am ET. It will play again 
Sunday morning at around the same time. On June 26, Samurai #1 will 
be on at 8am and again at 2pm ET.

-MissBehavin (Still irked she manages to miss Sword of Doom every 
single time.)
